#summary About the Apply Operator
<wiki:toc/>

== Introduction ===
The apply operator `*` is a shortcut for the pattern:
{{{
# Normal syntax.
foo = foo->somefunc
# Apply operator syntax.
*foo->somefunc
}}}
So far it only works with receiver functions.

== Examples ==

=== 1) ===
Introduction example one.
{{{
ar1 = ["el1" "el2"]
ar2 = ["el3" "el4"]
*ar1->array_merge(ar2)
}}}
Output:
{{{
# ar1 == ["el1" "el2" "el3" "el4"]
}}}
